comments: Number of permutations of length n with exactly one valley. Also (for n>0), the number of ways to pick two of the 2^(n-1) vertices of an n-1 cube that are not connected by an edge. - _Aaron Meyerowitz_, Apr 21 2014a(n+1), n >= 1: Number of independent vertex pairs for Q_n, n >= 1: 2^(n-1) * (2^n - (n+1)) = T_(2^n - 1) - n * 2^(n-1) = L_n - E_n = A006516(n) - A001787(n), where L_n is the number of vertex pairs and E_n is the number of vertex pairs yielding edges. (Cf. A027624.) - _Daniel Forgues_, Feb 19 2015
